name: Bears & Boxes
description:
Finish the game by walking past the truck once you've gotten all your boxes, don't forget to go into town to find the rest.

I made this over a year ago but never did anything with it, but replaying it I actually liked it, so here it is.

made with Bitsy HD by @FredBednarski, originally by @adamledoux

song is Abi and Travel from the Tenniscoats
